title: Global electricity consumption 1980 to 2016
yAxis: Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours, containing a total of 13 data points.
Overall Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours has increased over the Year.
Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours is slightly increasing from 1980 to 2010, and finally roughly constant from 2010 to 2016.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2005 and 2010.
The highest Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours, of value 21801.0 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours, of value 7323.0 was reported at Year 1980
